description: This small village is located in East Riding of Yorkshire, near North Cave and Market Weighton . This walk from the village takes you south past the historic Hotham Hall Estate. The Georgian Hall includes parkland, gardens and lakes and stretches down to the neighbouring village of North Cave. Here you can extend the walk by heading west to visit the North Cave Wetlands nature reserve where there's lots of birdlife to look out for.
